chunk_size.description: Maximum size of chunks to return
chunk_size.title: Chunk Size

keep_separator.description: Whether to keep the separator in the chunks
keep_separator.title: Keep Separator

strip_whitespace.description: If `True`, strips whitespace from the start and end of every document
strip_whitespace.title: Strip Whitespace

headers_to_split_on.description: Headers we want to track, e.g., h1, h2, etc.
headers_to_split_on.title: Headers To Split On

return_each_element.description: Return each element w/ associated headers
return_each_element.title: Return Each Element
